titles.title: A bill to clarify the definition of rural airports.
A bill to clarify the definition of rural airports.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the exception to the air transportation segment excise tax of domestic segments beginning or ending at a rural airport, to treat as a rural airport any airport which is not connected by paved roads to another airport.
